thread.title: WATCH: Jolly Rancher makes fun of Joel Embiid in new commercial
thread.title_full: WATCH: Jolly Rancher makes fun of Joel Embiid in new commercial

author: Rob Tornoe
title: WATCH: Jolly Rancher makes fun of Joel Embiid in new commercial
text:
WATCH: Jolly Rancher makes fun of Joel Embiid in new commercial Updated: March 21, 2017 — 1:36 PM EDT 83 Share Arrow icon 
Back in February, on the day Joel Embiid would dance shirtless at a Meek Mill concert, he spent time shooting his first commercial, a 30-second spot for Jolly Rancher. 
The commercial, part of Jolly Rancher’s “Keep On Sucking” campaign, features an announcer introducing Embiid by making fun of the phenom’s injury-filled three seasons with the Sixers . 
“Sitting out his first two seasons for boo-boos,” an announcer loudly proclaims over the public address system. "And now, out for the season after we shot this commercial." 
"With a rookie year lasting longer than a Jolly Rancher, Joel ‘The Process’ Embiid !" the announcer continues. "Keep on sucking." Poll Would the 76ers be better off keeping T.J. McConnell or Nik Stauskas? McConnell Results 
Watch: 
"I thought I did great today," Embiid told Liberty Baller’s Jake Pavorsky , who interviewed him during the filming of the commercial. "I want to get into that part of the business more." 
SportsRadio 94.1 WIP host Howard Eskin, an outspoken critic of the Sixers the past few seasons, wasn't a fan of the commercial. 
Would be nice @JoelEmbiid could actually play more than 31 games in 3 years. Happy he's got some work other than w @MeekMill @SportsRadioWIP https://t.co/ySSpiq5fAb 
— Howard Eskin (@howardeskin) March 21, 2017 
Jolly Rancher featured Todd Gurley in its first “Being a Rookie Sucks” commercial, showcasing the Rams running back wearing a tutu and dancing in the locker room. Read more by Rob Tornoe Published: March 21, 2017 — 12:23 PM EDT | Updated: March 21, 2017 — 1:36 PM EDT Do you have a minute?...
